name: Grim Reapurr
description:
Eli Mcardle: Design and Programming

Kyle Gunger: Programming and Art

Lucas Hardy: Music, Sound, and Art

Walker McDonald: Design and Programming

Every time someone dies, the Grim Reaper is faced with an extraordinary ammount of paperwork to file and doesn't have enough time for you, one of his pet cats. Save as many people as possibly from the Reaper for maximum petting.
